stories.text:
This book by William R. Catton, Jr. will change the way you view the world. The front cover shows the fundamental source of the predicament we are experiencing.

Carrying Capacity: maximum permanently supportable load

Cornucopian Myth: euphoric belief in limitless resources

Drawdown: stealing resources from the future

Cargoism: delusion that technology will always save us from ...

Overshoot: growth beyond an area's carrying capacity, leading to ...

Crash: die-off

If you want another world-changing source, see the video

Arithmetic, Population and Energy - a talk by Al Bartlett (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O133ppiVnWY)

or, if you prefer an entertaining world-changing view, watch this play

Robert Newman's History of Oil (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sehmmzbi3UI)
